trails.title: YOUR TRAILS
trails.empty.title: No trails yet
trails.empty.subtitle: Connect to Apple Health and import your workouts to see them here.
trails.emptyFilter: No trails match the selected activities
stack.empty.title: No trails yet
stack.empty.subtitle: Connect to Apple Health and import your workouts to stack them on the map.
stack.selectAreaOverlay: Select an area to see trails
settings.title: Settings
settings.showLocationHint: Requires location access to display your position on the Stack tab map.
settings.importHint: Imports running, walking, cycling, hiking, and open water swimming workouts with GPS routes. Requires read-only access to Apple Health — your data is never uploaded or shared.
settings.healthDialog.title: Apple Health Access
settings.healthDialog.message:
Stack My Trails reads your workout routes from Apple Health to visualize them on the map.

It reads running, walking, cycling, hiking, and swimming workouts that have GPS route data recorded by Apple Watch or any GPS-enabled workout app.

You will be asked to grant read-only access when you tap Import for the first time. Your health data is never uploaded, shared, or stored outside your device.
settings.exportHint: Export your trails as a signed backup file. Import on another device or after reinstalling.
settings.alert.locationMessage: Please enable location access in Settings to show your position on the map.
settings.alert.deleteMessage: This will remove all imported trails and cached labels. You will need to re-import.
filter.noAreasMatch: No areas match the current filters
filter.mergeMessage: "{{name}}" already exists. All workouts will be merged under this label.
filter.mergeDragMessage: Some areas will merge with existing areas in "{{city}}". All workouts will be combined.
export.title: Export
export.alert.permissionMessage: Please allow access to save photos.
export.alert.savedMessage: Poster saved to your photo library.
dataIo.wrongApp: This file was not created by Stack My Trails
dataIo.noTrailData: Invalid file — no trail data found
dataIo.signatureFailed: Signature verification failed — file may be corrupted or tampered with
dataIo.missingFields: Invalid trail record — missing required fields
settings.keepAppOpen: Keep the app open during import
settings.labelsFailed: {{count}} location labels could not be loaded. Tap Update Labels to retry.
